alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:05PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of through 630 PM MDT... At 605 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Palisade, or 19 miles southeast of Grand Junction, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of . This includes U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 46 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
